title: Leftist Nightmare: Why not make vaccination passports and voter ID documents one and the same?
cleaned_text:
Leftist Nightmare: Why not make vaccination passports and voter ID documents one and the same?

Every day, it gets easier to call out the hypocrisy of the Marxist government of America that’s heading up the rules for voting and “health safety.” It all worked hand-in-hand to steal the POTUS election, crash Trump’s economy, and gain control of the masses using masks and mass-shutdowns of non-corporate businesses. So as they (CDC and CCP) all demand that we get “fully vaccinated” with deadly Covid jabs and then show proof of it, then we shall demand voter identification (with social security number attached) to pair with that vaccine identification, because we all know they won’t ever do it.

During this dirty-Covid-vaccine bioweapon assault on Americans, lead by the CDC and the CCP, we’ve been told how absolutely essential it is that every American get tested for Covid, get shot up with Covid emergency experiment jabs, and then have proof we did all this on our smart phones using “vaccine passport” apps. This is not racist, or bigoted, or white supremacist in any way, they say, but somehow, voter ID is. So, with that logic, it’s super important to use identification to show you’ve received blood-clotting vaccines, but it’s racist to use identification when voting for the highest office of the land, which circles back to the decision making for the deadly vaccines.

Voter registration is racist, but vaccine passport identification is not?

The vaccine push is mostly being driven in the metropolitan cities of America, where most of the Democrats live, and the majority of that populace is poor and of a minority (Black or Hispanic). The Covid vaccines also are proven by science to terminate 4 out of 5 pregnancies, revealing how they are used for population reduction of minorities. Yet, somehow, forced vaccination and vaccination ID cards are not racist.

The Left claims voter ID is racist because they cheat in elections, having people vote multiple times, dead people vote, and now we know about falsified ballots, Sharpie-Gate, and Dominion voting machine fraud, so there’s all that.

The mad, mad rush is on to get the whole world vaccinated for Covid and issue vaccine passports as ID proof, but the mad, mad rush is also on to eliminate a couple hundred million US citizens and replace them with immigrants from Mexico, South America and China. The globalists are frantic to get at least 250 million Americans vaccinated, while the CDC flat out admits the vaccines are causing Covid outbreaks, making vaccinated people weaker, and making the Covid variants stronger and more aggressive.

Everyone must show proof of vaccination with ID, but “voter registration ID is racist!” screams “Mad Max” Waters! Sure.

If you want your cake, you’re going to have to eat it too. Want those vaccine passports so bad? Then it’s time to create those voter IDs too. You can’t have it both ways, and the American people who haven’t been stabbed to death with Covid jabs are outing the biggest lies in the biggest ways right now. Wake up America. The biological weapons of mass destruction are upon us, and this isn’t just some mercury-loaded flu shot; this is the vaccine industry creating trillions of microscopic blood clots in every human they can seduce with chemical violence.

Check out Pandemic.news for updates on these crimes against humanity and the upcoming “Delta” and Covid “booster-vaccine” Holocaust. Also, if you know someone who already got pricked with the blood-clotting Covid inoculations, and they’re suffering from lethargy, pain, clouded thinking, or an inflamed heart, that’s called CoVax Syndrome, so tell them to report it to VAERS.
